welcome.title: Welcome.
welcome.subtitle: Time is the most honest thing we have. It doesn't lie, pause, or negotiate. And yours is ticking.
welcome.timeMessage: This app isn't here to alarm you—it's here to awaken you.

reality.title: The Reality
reality.subtitle: Each minute slipping by is one you'll never touch again. So what will you do with what's left?
reality.daysMessage: days in an average human life

truth.title: The Truth
truth.subtitle: Every single day, people lie to themselves—'I'll do it tomorrow.' But tomorrow is not promised. You've been sold a lie: That there's always more time.
truth.lieMessage: The truth is harsh and unyielding. Every second you wait is gone forever.

action.title: Live Intentionally
action.subtitle: This isn't about pressure. It's about clarity. Because at the end, only two questions will matter: Did you pay attention? Did it mean something?

begin.title: Time Doesn't Wait
begin.message: Right now, someone else is doing the work you've delayed. They're building the life you're still dreaming about.
begin.subtitle: Whatever brought you here, this app is a mirror. A timer. A wake-up call. It doesn't just count down life—it counts what you do with it.

events.name: Event Name
events.errorSameDay: Event date cannot be today. Please select a future date.
